name: Sheep Legion - turn-based tactical RPG game
name_original: Sheep Legion - turn-based tactical RPG game
description:
【The choice of millions of players】
◆Top 1 game in the South Korean! Thanks to every player,we'll continue to update the game！

【Play easily】
◆Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.

【MMOTBS】
◆Fight in PVP battles.

【New strategy game】
◆New turn-based strategy game is coming!You'll learn polymorph and command kinds of heros to wipe out enemies!

【Cast Polymorph】
◆Monsters are too powerful! Don't worry, they can temporarily be turned into a sheep.

【Command an army】
◆There are a variety of roles in the army:warrior,archer,mage,priest,necromancer and eagle.

【Fight with dragon】
◆You will fight with a dangerous, fire-breathing dragon.

【Get free prizes】
◆This week, you will get 100 rubies,polymorph(5 times),healing spells(5 times) and frost magic(5 times).

【Game center support】
◆Connect with Game Center to find friends and compare high scores!The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【More】
◆And..... more to come!

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

◆This game is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
